Sentencas: This article describes recent advances in the use of yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ), an oxygen ion conductor, for catalytic applications.
Titulo: Applications of yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) in catalysis

Sentencas: This ceramic material combines different functionalities such as good thermal stability, selective bulk oxygen mobility and high surface oxygen vacancy concentration.
Titulo: Applications of yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) in catalysis

Sentencas: These properties have been first exploited, utilizing YSZ as dense membranes, in the field of solid oxide fuel cells and electrochemical promotion of catalysis.
Titulo: Applications of yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) in catalysis

Sentencas: More recently, YSZ, as nanometric powders, has also been considered as a promising support for metallic nanoparticles or as a catalyst itself.
Titulo: Applications of yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) in catalysis

Sentencas: This paper summarizes the main applications of YSZ in the aforementioned fields, explains the underlying phenomena and finally provides perspectives for future applications of YSZ.
Titulo: Applications of yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) in catalysis
